name: adventure_with_firefly
description:
This game based on cartoon created in my Junior high school，it tells some nonsenscial story about 3 Matchstick Men，although it is nonsenscial,yet very funny.
In this game,you can enjoy:
1.strange art
2.some strange playing method,such as Puzzling escape
3.the nonsenscial but pure fun
4.extra stage for plot
it is a low-budget game and the creator is preparing National College Entrance Examination，so it still has many problems and can not updat regularly.
